review: arrived VERY quickly, with in 48 hrs of order, set up in 5 minutes, works like a charm.
author: James A Gold

review: Amazing what a little (inexpensive) tech gadget like this can do. Highly recommended.
author: C. Luciani

review: I love this media player, it does everything I was hoping for, easy to set up and very convenient, I can cast from my phone and even my desk up it just needs a wireless connection but I figured it out, to my luck ATT had already provided me with one, definitely would recommend this product.
author: Rosie

review: It works fine. I'd give it a 5 if this device mirrored my phone, htc one m8, which they dont support.
author: pedro
